name: Nero Engine - Isometric RPG Template (Construct3)
description:
Nero-Engine - Isometric RPG Game Template (For Construct2, Construct3)

Make your own Isometric RPG, Visual Novels, or Story Driven Puzzle game easily using Construct3!

This Functional Demo for the Isometric RPG Template showcases Modular Room Systems, NPC Dialogue, Puzzles, Menu & Inventory, and More!
Explore each room, collect items, solve puzzles, and make your way to the final room!

AVAILABLE NOW as a Full Game Template for developers!

Create your own Isometric RPG Game easily starting with the Nero-Engine Template!
